original_text: When people like to have lots of money, it causes all kinds of bad things to happen. Some people have stopped believing the message about Christ because they want to get more money. As a result, they have caused themselves to become sad with many troubles.
korean_text: 돈을 사랑함이 일만 악의 뿌리가 되나니 이것을 탐내는 자들은 미혹을 받아 믿음에서 떠나 많은 근심으로써 자기를 찔렀도다

sentences.original_text: When people like to have lots of money
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 많은 돈을 갖고 싶어할 때

sentences.original_text: it causes all kinds of bad things to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 종류의 나쁜 일들이 일어나게 합니다

sentences.original_text: Some people have stopped believing the message about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 그리스도에 대한 메시지를 믿는 것을 멈추었습니다

sentences.original_text: because they want to get more money
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 더 많은 돈을 얻고 싶어하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: they have caused themselves to become sad
